short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open JIRA issues by entering the ticket id

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is helping in quick opening JIRA tickets with a keyboard shortcut.

Just fill up your JIRA URL (eg https://my-jira-url.atlassian.net/) and then use Command(Ctrl)+Shift+1 keyboard combination in order to open the extension. Input the ticket number (eg; TKT-100) and press enter. The extension will open up a new tab with the details page of the TKT-100 JIRA ticket.

In case your keyboard shortcut is not working, go to chrome://extensions/shortcuts and setup the shortcut for JIRA FastLink.
